name: SlippySlime
description:
SlippySlime

A 2D pixel art platformer where you must guide your slime from one level to the next. There are currently 8 levels and maybe more coming, depending on if I come up with any interesting ideas. I made this game to improve my understanding of Aseprite and Unity's Tilemap system.

Controls:

  • Arrow keys, W,S,A,D, or UI Buttons for movement.
  • SPACE to hide mobile controls.
  • Pressing on UI will open up appropriate info panels.

Production: Made with Unity 2020.1.5f1 and built to WebGL for Itch. Artwork and animation was drawn in Aseprite.

Known Issues:

  • Opening info panels mid game doesn't pause, so make sure you slime is stationary before opening any menus.
  • There isn't any sound at the moment but hopefully i'll add that at a later date.
